alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Louisiana, including the following parishes, Ascension, Assumption, East Baton Rouge, Iberville and Livingston. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas can be expected. Water could cover some roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, Geismar, Carville, Belle Rose, Prairieville, Paincourtville, Village St. George, Old Jefferson and Shenandoah. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston
